<template>
  <v-card
      tile
      dark
      elevation="0"
      class="full-height"
  >
    <v-img
        height="55vh"
        src="https://unsplash.com/photos/9OKGEVJiTKk/download?force=true&w=640"
    >

      <v-card-title class="justify-center" primary-title>
        Create and customize your own chat room!
      </v-card-title>

    </v-img>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'CreateRoomCard',
  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    selection: 1,
  }),

  methods: {
    reserve () {
      this.loading = true

      setTimeout(() => (this.loading = false), 2000)
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
